DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : CAIRO ; MIDEAST TALKS SET
DOC.TEXT: Palestinian and Israeli negotiators return to the table today in Cairo , hoping to work_out a package of security guarantees that will allow talks to resume on Palestinian self-rule in the West_Bank town of Jericho and the Gaza Strip . Negotiators failed to agree last week after marathon talks on the Palestine Liberation Organization ' s demand for Palestinian police patrols , international observers and curbs on arms for Jewish settlers in the West_Bank . But if closure can be reached today , both sides say they can move quickly toward implementing the declaration of principles for Palestinian autonomy reached last fall .
